values: All Scripture Is Breathed Out by God: Continue in ItAll Scripture Is Breathed Out by God: Continue in It

In light of opposition to Christianity in culture, we must hold fast to the Scriptures according to the pattern of 2 Timothy 3:14–17.In light of opposition to Christianity in culture, we must hold fast to the Scriptures according to the pattern of 2 Timothy 3:14–17.
